attributes.additional_details:
We the People of the United Kingdom request our government Does all in it's power to assist in capturing Joseph Kony, Head of the LRA in uganda

This man is guilty of Murder , enslaving young girls as sex slaves , forcing young boys to join his LRA army, and he has been indicted by the International Criminal Court on crimes against humanity. and is currently on the top 10 most wanted men list.

We the people Believe the government could be doing more to assist the Ugandan Government in the capture of Joseph Kony and formally request they do so.
